summary: This document is an email correspondence between Richard Kahn and Amanda Kirby discussing account details related to Jeffrey Epstein's personal accounts. The email highlights a $0 balance in the account and mentions the lack of incoming wires from JPM Best.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is inquiring about account details related to Jeffrey Epstein's personal accounts.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby responds to Richard Kahn regarding the account status, indicating a $0 balance.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is copied on the email correspondence regarding the account details.

connections.description: Richard Kahn and Amanda Kirby are communicating about financial matters related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, New York 10022
345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154-0304
keyFacts: Richard Kahn is seeking information about account numbers and incoming wires related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.
Amanda Kirby indicates that the account has a $0 balance and no wires have been received from JPM Best.
The correspondence is marked as confidential under Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e).
